Headline: #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd. Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Catalpa Ave
ShortDescription: 54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd. buses temp. rerouted NB: Cicero, Foster, I-94, Peterson EB exit and Cicero; SB: Cicero, Foster, Pulaski, Perterson and Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd. buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Cicero/Catalpa Ave.

Northbound buses will operate viaCicero, Foster, I-94, Peterson EB exit and Cicero.

Southbound buses will operate via Cicero, Foster, Pulaski, Perterson and Cicero.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green and Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green and Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problem near Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier signal problem near Roosevelt.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
